Description: On I-664 at mile marker 18 in the City of Chesapeake, near Dock Landing Road, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed. The south entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 177.5 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On Rt. 620 in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Stone Haven Dr; Rt. 4670N/S (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
